title: Hextech Mystery Champion Shard
body:
So,I was wondering.If riot is making this new feature,doesn't that mean we will only get more champion shards? (obviously)

Most of the things I got from hextech chests are champion shards and I already own them.So if they implement this new feature,would the odds of getting a champion shard from hextech chest be lower? 

I'm not really sure about this because what's the point of getting a champion shard from a chest when you could just buy it from the shop,they function the same way yeah? Altough it only gives champion shards.

Not saying that riot should completely remove getting champion shards from chests,just saying that maybe they should increase the probabilities of getting a skin instead of a champ shard.

* Anyhow I'm still quite confused.Just curious what you guys think and what your opinions are :)
